body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to CarDirect. My name is Ralph Baker, how may I address you?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Andrea. Could you please provide me with your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, two eight one, zero zero six four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also confirm your address for the shipping details?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. My address is one two three Maple Street, Anytown, USA.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for that information, Andrea. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that was all. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out, Andrea. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us. Have a great day!
